Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 15 Piercing and can curse with Lycanthropy
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 13 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Greataxe, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 10 Slashing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, In Bear form, the Werebear makes 2 Claw attacks.  In Humanoid form, the Werebear makes 2 Greataxe attacks.  In Hybrid form, the Werebear can attack like a Bear or a Humanoid

Abilities.Ability 1: Shapechanger, The Werebear can use its action to polymorph into a Large bear-humanoid hybrid or into a Large bear, or back into its true form, which is Humanoid
Abilities.Ability 2: Keen Smell, The Werebear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell

Damage Immunities.Damage 1: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
